home.headline: Detect
home.subtitle: Upload an image or video and let our multi-signal engine analyze it for signs of AI generation ‚Äî all within your browser.
home.disclaimer: Results are heuristic-based indicators, not definitive proof.
home.errorUnsupported: Unsupported format. Use JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, MP4, or WebM.
home.errorFailed: Analysis failed. Try a different file.
product.headline: Verify media
product.subtitle: An open-source detection engine that analyzes images and videos for signs of AI generation ‚Äî entirely in your browser.
product.card1.title: Multi-signal engine
product.card1.desc: 6+ detection algorithms running in parallel ‚Äî frequency analysis, noise patterns, edge detection, metadata inspection and more.
product.card2.title: Privacy by design
product.card2.desc: Every computation happens on your device. No uploads, no servers, no tracking. Your files never leave your browser.
product.card3.title: Real-time results
product.card3.desc: Analysis completes in milliseconds. No queues, no waiting, no accounts ‚Äî just instant, detailed feedback.
features.headline: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: A comprehensive toolkit for verifying media authenticity ‚Äî built for transparency and trust.
features.item1.title: Multi-signal Analysis
features.item1.desc: 6+ detection algorithms analyze frequency, noise, edge patterns and more simultaneously for comprehensive coverage.
features.item2.title: 100% Private
features.item2.desc: All processing runs locally in your browser. Zero data is ever uploaded to any server.
features.item3.title: Instant Results
features.item3.desc: Get detailed analysis results in milliseconds ‚Äî no waiting for server-side processing.
features.item4.title: High Accuracy
features.item4.desc: Advanced heuristic-based detection with confidence scoring across multiple dimensions.
features.item5.title: Images & Video
features.item5.desc: Full support for JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, AVIF, MP4, WebM ‚Äî any visual media format.
features.item6.title: Detailed Reports
features.item6.desc: Visual breakdown of every detection signal with score analysis and metadata extraction.
howItWorks.headline: Three simple
howItWorks.subtitle: From upload to verdict in seconds ‚Äî no setup, no account, no data collection.
howItWorks.step1.title: Upload your file
howItWorks.step1.desc: Drag and drop or click to upload any image or video. We support JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, MP4, WebM and more ‚Äî up to 100MB.
howItWorks.step2.title: Multi-signal analysis
howItWorks.step2.desc: Our engine runs 6+ detection algorithms in parallel ‚Äî analyzing frequency patterns, noise signatures, edge artifacts and metadata ‚Äî all locally in your browser.
howItWorks.step3.title: Get your results
howItWorks.step3.desc: View a detailed breakdown with an overall confidence score, individual signal analysis, and clear verdict on whether the content appears AI-generated.
about.headline: Building
about.p1: As AI-generated content becomes increasingly indistinguishable from real media, the need for reliable detection tools has never been greater.
about.p2suffix: detection engine that empowers anyone to verify content authenticity.
about.p3: Every analysis runs entirely in your browser ‚Äî no uploads, no tracking, no compromise.
